data.actual_result: The sentence try again later is cut off at the t in try and again is completely gone.
data.expected_result: The sentence "You are changing your username or Discord Tag. Try again later.", is formatted correctly to where you can see "try again later".
data.short_description: [English - 4 inch device, Another Language - 5.5 inch only] When you get rate limited for changing your username, the message that appears is not formatted correctly and the word try again is cut off.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to user setting and then go to account  - next change your name and enter your password - repeat step two until you are hit with a message   - obverse the message
